QuestData.Title: Tea Party
QuestData.Description: I...I-I'm sorry. I... I can't...$b$b <You hear footsteps behind you.>$b$b A... Abby? Wh...
QuestData.RewardText: Was that really Abby? Did she bring forth that... thing? We thought her dead not long ago.$b$bWhat could we have done to bring such... such horror upon our village?
